name: Enter Player Two
description:
Enter Player Two is a semi-serious teamwork game based around problem solving and communication.

Primary Learning Objectives -

  • The team will learn the importance of working together to solve complex problems.
  • The team will learn the importance of communication to aid collaborative efforts.

Secondary Learning Objectives - 

  • The team will…
    • Know how to approach problems as a team.
    • Know how to solve complex problems by breaking sections down.
    • Know how to solve complex problems by working as a team rather than as an individual.
    • Understand that some problems can only be solved by working together.
    • Understand that complex problems require dynamic solutions from both members.
    • Understand that through teamwork, impossible tasks become very possible. 
    • Be able to solve complex problems as a team.
    • Be able to deploy creative and collaborative solutions to problems at hand.
    • Be able to work together to solve tasks impossible to an individual.

Primary Features -

  • Leap from platform to platform, aided by your partner
  • Block lasers to allow for your teammate to jump through
  • Dodge lasers blocked by your team mate
  • Collect coins for a score enhancement
  • Jump over spikes
  • Provide aerial cover for your teammate
  • Collect Mystery objects for a secret unlock
  • Navigate to goals together
  • Learn to solve dynamic puzzles
  • Collect Hearts for an extra life
  • Learn to communicate efficiently and effectively

Adaptation - 

The fact is, not every team is has the same skill level…

  • Extra Life during Learning
  • Extra Hearts
  • Movement Aids
  • Platforms to protect difficult jumps
  • Downward Movement and Jumping Aid
  • Hints based on performance
